text: lankawe rakiya wirahitha upadhidharinge prashnayak thiyenne atham wruththikayin sandaha welandapola illuma ha rate awashyathawayan galapimata pramanawath sapayumak thibiyadi usas adhyapanaya subasadhanaya kirima mangin kruthima lesa sapayuma thawath wadi kirima nisaya.

ema amathyanshaye pawathi madhya hamuwakadi eeye (03da) me bawa prakasha kala ee mahatha lada janawarama anuwa katayuthu kirimata agramathyawarayata ha janadhipathiwarayata awasthawa labi athi bawath, ee anuwa owun kese kriya karannedayi bala sitimen anathuruwa siya karanaya prakasha karana bawath sandahan kaleya.

ek sathiyaka ganika wruththiya nithigatha kirima ganath,eelanga sathiye bhugatha bankar soyaganima ganath,me sathiya wana wita antharaya wisin kandawana lada ech en di sisunge eeniya udghoshanayata polisiya wisin pahara dima ganath wishala pracharayak di atha.me puwath dakina asana boho dena ee pilibanda thama thamange adahas udahas ha wirodhayanda noaduwa dakwana bawa da sathyayaki.ekak ekinekata nogalapena lesa sathiyak sathiyak pasa mathuwana mewani siduwim ekata gath kala apata therum gatha hakke kumakdayi kisiwek ho kalpana kara athda?ese kalpana karana kenek hata nam danenne anagathe apata,apa ratata muhuna dimata siduwana wyasanayak gana noweda?
